name: Mary Skelter: Nightmares
description: The "Jail" suddenly appeared a number of years ago, sinking the city deep into the ground. There, this impenetrable living prison 666 metres beneath the surface, held power over eerie creatures called "Marchens." Within the prison was a boy named Jack - living a life of suffering...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: XAudio2 compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: XAudio2 compatible sound card
